title: Update README with flight simulator documentation
Add crash detection when plane hits ground
description: Implement collision detection between the plane and the ground terrain. When the plane's altitude intersects with the ground height, trigger a crash state that ends the game with a crash message/animation.

title: Collectibles and Pickups
description: Add collectible items (stars/coins) that spawn in the air for players to collect, adding risk/reward gameplay element.

title: Dynamic Difficulty Progression
description: Implement progressive difficulty that increases terrain variation and scroll speed over time to keep gameplay engaging.

title: Fuel Management System
description: Add fuel consumption mechanics with fuel gauge, pickups, and out-of-fuel crash condition to increase challenge.

title: Score and Progression System
description: Implement scoring system to track player performance and add replay value. Includes distance traveled, time survived, and high score persistence.
